title: undefined method `add_template_location' for Sass::Plugin:Module
body:
I upgraded rails for a site of mine. It said I need to install the sass gem so I did. But now, when I run rails:update, I get:

```
$ rake rails:update --trace
(in /home/mrbrdo/rails/profesorji)
rake aborted!
undefined method `add_template_location' for Sass::Plugin:Module
/home/mrbrdo/rails/profesorji/config/application.rb:41
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.8.7-p334/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems/custom_require.rb:36:in `gem_original_require'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/rubies/ruby-1.8.7-p334/lib/ruby/site_ruby/1.8/rubygems/custom_require.rb:36:in `require'
/home/mrbrdo/rails/profesorji/Rakefile:4
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2383:in `load'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2383:in `raw_load_rakefile'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2017:in `load_rakefile'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2068:in `standard_exception_handling'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2016:in `load_rakefile'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2000:in `run'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:2068:in `standard_exception_handling'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/lib/rake.rb:1998:in `run'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/gems/rake-0.8.7/bin/rake:31
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/bin/rake:19:in `load'
/home/mrbrdo/.rvm/gems/ruby-1.8.7-p334/bin/rake:19
```
